column5: I know, I know its not snowmobile weather, but I was hoping to do some work on my machine while it was warm (for a change).  I'm looking to install a reverse kit on my 1993 Polaris Indy Trail 440. Anyone know of any used parts dealers/wreckers in Southern Ontario? Anywhere within 2 hours of the GTA would be perfect.
TJs in the Alliston area. I've been a few times but can't remember the exact location, I'll try to find it.
How about JT's in New Lowell, 705-424-1691, about 20 minutes west of Barrie. Call Trevor.

Theres a guy in Orillia that sells Polaris parts, I'll see if i can find his info.  found it  http://barrie.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles-AT...QQAdIdZ90901403  found this as well  http://toronto.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles-A...QAdIdZ136436100
That's him! I knew there ws a J and a T and I got it ass backwards!
Snowlinesports   Try snowline sports in London
Thanks for the links folks. Looks like everyone has them in stock. You've saved my back.
